name: NaturalTherapyForAll
overview:
NaturalTherapyForAll.com is a network that efficiently connects people, with various health problems, to professional, reliable therapists from all over the UK. But NaturalTherapyForAll.com is more than a leading therapist directory, as they aim to build a network in which therapists respect clients’ needs by providing superior service based on their experience, and for people with various health problems to find professional, reliable therapists. They also provide regularly-updated and high-quality information about various therapies on our website, so visitors can discover which disciplines are suitable for a specific condition and choose the right therapist from our extensive register of qualified, reliable therapists.

After their service was launched in 2009, they have grown rapidly in both size and popularity, now receiving more than two-hundred thousand visitors monthly and connecting hundreds of people with local therapists every month.

For the visitor (or potential client) NaturalTherapyForAll provide as much information as you will need, including full therapist profiles, detailing the health concerns and problems with which each therapist can help, the fees they charge, their training, work experience, achievements, and reviews received from other clients. This detailed profile provides potential clients with the information they might need to make an informed decision as to which therapist they should see. Having made that decision, their free booking system allows the client to schedule appointments with the therapist â€“ online â€“ 24/7.
